Prev: Space Needle viewing platform Up: Miscellaneous Seattle Next: Butterfly exhibit at the Pacific Science Center

AAA sign



This was our navigation landmark: our hotel was only a block away from this sign. We needed any help we could get finding the hotel the night we came in: after a couple minor mistakes we found ourselves trapped in a crowded parking lot a few blocks away and had to circle around several times to get where we wanted to be.
Taken Sunday, July 20, 2003, 03:37:02pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 5.6Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/4000s @ F8.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 200mm (320mm equiv)
PS7 CRW Daylight, 1.5:2:50:50:25:30, Crop, USM 10:200
